creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
description: portrait of a man standing outside on the sidwalk wearing a navy blue jacket and hat and aviation goggles; the man's left arm is wrapped around a street sign; blurred figure walking toward the viewer on the left side of the composition.
inscription: TC in black ink: N.Y.C 1947 / (copyright) Louis Faurer / (10/10) \\ LC in black ink: PRINTED 1991
title: 14th Street, New York, NY
